Row.Text: No salutations needed, foreigner. I am the exalted Raiden Shogun, who set her mind straight for the sake of Inazuma's prosperity. I will cut you down without hesitation should you prove to be a danger to Inazuma, so bear no malice here.
The mortal plane... a fleeting dream...
Detached from the world...
What is the situation?
State your query. To the point.
What needs my attention, foreigner?
I come in behalf of the people of Inazuma to acquire this demanded luxury. I hope you will agree with this request.
There are things that must be done and what must not be done, I came to you to acquire the resources to do what must be done.

The world remains constant over the centuries while what humans make lasts but a fleeting moment. I nevertheless want to see how the moment's development and eternity mesh together. Will you not do the same?
Begin.
Good day to you.
It is a good day for desserts! Cavities are no big deal â€” you can just replace your teeth. Desserts are not a serious obstacle to my pursuit of eternity.
I have judged you to be useful to the Shogunate. I hope you will prove to be that way, and I will provide you whatever amenity I can to make it so.
Enemy of eternity.
You are a demon that begets ill thoughts.
The time that we spend may be but a moment, but do not waste it.
The glory of conquest lasts but a fleeting moment. It is foolish of you to provoke me.
I will not make judgment regarding your intent, but I will request you to pull your troops back for the sake of both nations.
The movement of borders is transitory, but what you do threatens eternity and I advise you to halt.
The movement of borders is transitory, but I will not tolerate things that danger my pursuit of eternity.
You are deemed the enemy of eterniy, and thus I have decided to cut you personally. Now, you shall perish!
Yes, the transitory nature of human life makes you pathetically violent.
Remove all obstacles.
You believe me this powerless. Foolishness.
Absurd.
Torn to oblivion!
Pathetic and foolish one! Glory in the mortal plane is but a fleeting dream!
Yes, the transitory nature of human life makes you want to raise a thunderclap. So be it, I accept your challenge.
Insolent, but I too am interested in combat.
The mortal plane is a fleeting dream, and I will satisfy your lust for conflict.
Absurd, you seek to challenge an ill-prepared opponent. However, I am curious how my skill takes me.
Torn to oblivion!
Pathetic and foolish one! You will be punished by the eternal lightning!
Erosion is a terrible thing, but it will be overcome through repairs and growth.
I said desserts are not a serious obstacle to my pursuit of eternity. Economy and Civilizations may be fleeting, but progress is eternal, yes?
To pursue eternity one must be able to withstand any threat at any moment. I will look to your example.
Ah, the drive to advance and evolve in the martial arts is truly fantastic, no?
I have counseled with the Kanjou Commission. This offer is too large for us to handle.
Do you honestly think that acquiring technology through illicit means will help you in the long run?
I still believe you are useful to the Shogunate, so I advise you to cease and repent.
If you think you can achieve eternity through such cheap tricks you are misguided.
I will purge all enemies of eternity. Your spy was purged accordingly.
I would like to see what your civilization has accomplished in its short moment alongside eternity. Will you not indulge this one?
As the advancement in martial art is fantastic, creation and evolution is not the enemy of eternity. Surely, we can work something that will stand the test of time?
The mortal realm might be fleeting, but to think I will be stained by evil in that brief moment.
The pursuit of eternity was ultimately a part of a promise to bring prosperity to my people. Unchanging rules are unconducive to growth, and there is a need to adopt a more flexible chain of thought.
What is outside eternity is an exception, and it must be rectified.
This one would like to call you a friend of the Shogunate. Will you accept?
I would like to maintain our relationship as a part of pursuing eternity.
Mortal life is fleeting as a dew, but I would like to stay with you.
You could have saved them all. If you remember me I can be eternal. Then, shall we breach once more?
Avarice for that small piece of land... Incredible.
If only contracts were eternal, but I suppose renewing it is in spirit of eternity, don't you think?
I accept that proposal.
That will do.
Alright.
You show goodwill toward Inazuma. I happily accept.
I will not decline aid to my pursuit of eternity.
I will accept with thanks in behalf of the people of Inazuma.
I decline.
I find this unsatisfactory.
Do not try to make ill gains at the cost of the people of Inazuma.
Nonsense.
Foolishness!
I am not idle for such blabberings.
I am thankful that you have saved the people of Inazuma.
